A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Abysmal. Horribly written. Star Wars is dead to me. I couldn't care less about the last installment. There is nowhere it can go or any characters that even matter to end a 9 movie saga in any compelling way now. I have seen fan fiction better written than this. Literally\, nothing happens that any of the characters were required to be there for. The story is an excuse for scenes to happen instead of the other way around. I'm so depressed at how bad this movie is.
